page.title: 02CHILDRENS GAMES.
page.content: BULLDOG is a game where a few people have to run across a field,without being caught by the person on in the middle.When you have been caught you are on with the person in the middle. The last person to be caught is on and the game starts again. ROUNDERS has 9 people and 10 with a reserve.You have 4 people which go on bases,4 who field and 1 bowler.The idea is to get as many rounders when you hit the ball with the bat. MONOPOLY is a game for 2 or players. You have a token which you round the board according to what the dice may say.As you move round the board you can buy properties.The idea of the game is to have as many properties and money as you can.
